word: H5953 - עָלַל - ʻâlal - aw-lal' - Abuse - துஷ்பிரயோகம்செய்

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - செய், நடப்பி, போட்டுவிடு, செய்திரு, நோவுண்டாக்கு, பொறுக்கு, அறு. கொல்லு, ஆகாமியம் செய். உண்டான, நடப்பித்திரு, பரியாசம்பண்ணு, தீங்காயிரு, அவமானப் படுத்து, இலச்சையாயிரு
1) to act severely, to deal with severely, to make a fool of someone
b) (Poal) to be severely dealt with
c) (Hithpael) to busy oneself, to divert oneself, to deal wantonly, to deal ruthlessly, to abuse (by thrusting through)
d) (Hithpoel) to practice practices, to thrust forth (in wickedness)
3) (Poel) to act or play the child
4) (Poel) to insert, to thrust, to thrust in, to thrust upon

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to effect thoroughly; specifically to glean (also figuratively); by implication (in a bad sense) to overdo, that is, maltreat, be saucy to, pain, impose (also literally): - abuse, affect, X child, defile, do, glean, mock, practise, throughly, work (wonderfully).
Cognate: H4611, H5768, H5923, H5948, H5949, H5950, H5953, H5955, H8586
